Deepwater Horizon was directed by Peter Berg and stars Mark Wahlberg Kurt Russell and John Malkovich This is based on the Deepwater Horizon ex plosion that occurred in 2010 and oil spill in the Gulf of Mexico in which the c rew members find themselves fighting for survival meanwhile the flames become stifling and overwhelming which eventually killed several crew members In the beginning of the film where they just argue whether to conduct a pressure test or not with some jargons maybe or just couldn t get that oil system but as the flames spread and make them run away asap from where they are it s getting really thrilling to see if they can make it or not In my opinion it was worth watch ing it for those who have never heard of that events like me before watch ing this Also I learnt how much the people working in oil factories risk their lives on it all the time. Although it s not that interesting film we won t end up seeing this for nothing We ll definitely gain something worth from this Thanks for reading my review of Deepwater Horizon.

ãƒ¦ãƒŠã‚¤ãƒ†ãƒƒãƒ‰ã‚·ãƒãƒž ç†Šæœ¬. äººç”Ÿ æ•™è¨“ ãƒ¢ãƒŽ æ¥½ã—ã‚ ã¾ã— ã‚¸ãƒ£ãƒ³ãƒ« ä»•äº‹ ã¦ã‚‹ äºº é€šã˜ã‚‹.

Peter Berg really found his groove Between this Patriots Day and Lone Survivor he is stepping up his game as a director. One of the reason s this movie succeeds beyond just a typical real story depiction was that all the c haracters felt real It s just a bunch of people coming together for another day at work and they joke around each other and be humorous. The lead up was scary too The transition from another day at the office to the eventual oil spill was terrifying One problem that seemed so inconsequential leads to something that they couldn t ever predict The way each person dealt with t he situation was so real too. Every one drove this movie Mark Wahlberg s ability to incorporate humor and drama simultaneously he nails it Kurt Russell fits well into his role here looking like an everyday man I never thought I liked Kate Hudson too. It s depiction of the events mixed with character emotion was so naturally combined well I don t want to call this an action movie but when the blowout occurs it s sort of entertaining to watch That might be a little insulting but it works in the movie s favor.
